main event: An orange-red, round object with a tail was observed descending at a 45 degree angle and gaining speed before disappearing below the horizon.
interesting points: The object was initially sighted at about a 45 degree angle in the sky.
The object's tail was the same size as its body.
The object appeared to be traveling at a high speed, estimated around 1000 mph.
The sighting was observed both visually and on ground radar.
Other aircraft, including B-47s dropping chaff, were in the area at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: An orange-red, round object with a tail
witnesses: Military personnel, including a pilot and weather forecaster
